name: Citrus Sap
description: From Crockett Family Farms and DNA Genetics, Citrus Sap is a hybrid cross between Gorilla Glue #4 and Tangie. Growers can expect high yields, heavy resin production, and a sweet mandarin orange aroma, as well as a high calyx-to-leaf ratio. Its flowering time averages between 65 to 70 days.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Focused, Fatigue, Depression, Pain, Stress, Headaches, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Anxious, Headache
